improvement_list.improvement_desc: The variable x is modified within the loop, but its initial value is not used. Consider initializing x within the loop to avoid this.

The loop iterates 49 times; this is computationally expensive. Consider if this many iterations are truly needed. This could impact performance; explore alternative approaches that may reduce runtime. Ensure that the loop has a valid exit condition to prevent infinite loops.

Division by zero is possible if y equals 0. Add a check to ensure y is not zero before performing the division to prevent runtime errors. If the division by zero exception occurs, handle it safely, for example, by catching the exception or returning an error code.
